'''''Report on the Excavation of the Prehistoric, Roman, and Post-Roman Site in Lydney Park, Gloucestershire''''' was published in July [[1932]]. [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] contributed with an essay, "[[The Name 'Nodens']]", included as Appendix I (pp. 132â€“7). The book was printed in 1,150 copies.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=13560|articlename=Report on the Excavation in Lydney Park. 1932|dated=|website=TB|accessed=9 July 2012}}</ref><ref>{{CG|C}}, p. 164</ref>
